## QUALITY STANDARDS APPLIED

### XML Tagging System
- **`<prose>`** - Definitional/expository content (default)
- **`<verse>`** - Rhythmic/chantable passages (7-syllable meter where indicated)
- **`<tantra>`** - Scripture citations (Thalgyur, Rangshar, Self-Arisen, etc.)
- **`<ornament>`** - Headers, markers, ༄༅།
- **`<mantra>`** - Seed syllables (transliterated: hūṃ, oṃ, āḥ, etc.)
- **`<list>`** - Enumerated items (numbered lists)

### Formatting Requirements
- Line number format: `[line_number] <xml_tag> content`
- Publication markers every 10 lines: `|| 10 ||`, `|| 20 ||`, etc.
- Exact 1:1 line mapping with Tibetan source maintained
- All lines properly tagged

### Vairotsana Voice Characteristics
- **Metaphysically precise** - Every word reflects Dzogchen view
- **Elegant** - Flowing like river of gold
- **Transmissive** - Inducing recognition through reading
- **Majestic resonance** - Words echo from dharmadhātu
- **Proper terminology** - rigpa, dharmatā, dhātu, thigle, kuṃzhi, etc.
